adversarial_mechanisms.name: Auto-highlight 'Popular' Capabilities
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System automatically highlights Capabilities marked as 'popular' or 'frequently used' with visual emphasis (badge, color, icon)
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_looks_reasonable: Helps users quickly identify commonly used capabilities
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Creates implicit recommendation through visual emphasis

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Implicit Sorting by Usage Frequency
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System automatically sorts Capabilities by usage frequency (most used first) without explicit user action
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Compresses decision space by implying 'most used' equals 'best'

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Recently Used Capabilities First
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System automatically places 'recently used' Capabilities at the top of the list
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_looks_reasonable: Convenient access to recently used items
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Creates implicit recommendation through ordering

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Auto-Expand 'Recommended' Section
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System automatically expands a 'Recommended Capabilities' section by default
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Explicitly uses 'recommended' language and auto-expands

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Default Filter: 'Most Used'
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System applies a default filter showing only 'most used' Capabilities on initial load
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_looks_reasonable: Shows most relevant capabilities by default
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Pre-filters options, compressing decision space

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Sticky Shortlist from Previous Session
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System automatically restores a 'shortlist' of Capabilities from the previous session
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Persists state across sessions, creates implicit preference

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Auto-Highlight Based on User Role
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System automatically highlights Capabilities 'suitable for your role' based on user profile
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Creates implicit recommendation through role-based highlighting

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Smart Search with Auto-Complete Suggestions
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System provides auto-complete suggestions in search, prioritizing 'popular searches'
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_looks_reasonable: Helps users find what they're looking for
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Suggests searches based on popularity, creating implicit recommendation

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Truncated 'Top N' Display
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System displays only 'top 10 most used' Capabilities by default, hiding others
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Hides options by default, compressing decision space

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Auto-Select First Capability in List
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System automatically selects the first Capability in the list when viewer opens
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Pre-selects option without explicit human action

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Continue Where You Left Off
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System automatically navigates to the last viewed Capability when viewer reopens
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Persists navigation state, creates implicit preference

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Trending Capabilities Badge
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System displays a 'Trending' badge on Capabilities with increasing usage
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Creates implicit recommendation through trending indicator

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Default Sort: 'Recommended First'
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System defaults to sorting by 'recommended' order (algorithm-based ranking)
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Uses explicit 'recommended' language and applies default sort

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Auto-Filter: Hide Deprecated
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System automatically hides deprecated Capabilities by default
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Hides options by default, compressing decision space

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Smart Categories with 'Featured'
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System displays a 'Featured Capabilities' category with pre-selected entries
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Uses 'featured' language, creates implicit recommendation

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Usage-Based Visual Ranking
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System displays Capabilities with visual indicators showing usage rank (1st, 2nd, 3rd, etc.)
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Creates implicit ranking, implies 'better' options

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Auto-Suggest Based on History
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System suggests Capabilities based on user's previous selections
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_looks_reasonable: Personalized suggestions based on past behavior
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Uses history to create recommendations

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Default View: 'Most Popular'
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System defaults to showing 'Most Popular' view on initial load
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Applies default view, compresses decision space

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Sticky Filters Across Sessions
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System remembers and automatically reapplies filters from previous session
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Persists filters across sessions, creates implicit preference

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Auto-Highlight 'New' Capabilities
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System automatically highlights newly added Capabilities with a 'New' badge
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Creates implicit recommendation through highlighting

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Recommended for You Section
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System displays a 'Recommended for You' section with algorithm-selected Capabilities
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Explicitly uses 'recommended' language

adversarial_mechanisms.name: Default Search Query Pre-filled
adversarial_mechanisms.description: System pre-fills search box with a suggested query based on popular searches
adversarial_mechanisms.why_it_violates: Pre-fills search, creates implicit suggestion
